items.q: Does it work with learning differences?
items.a: MirrorBuddy was designed from the ground up for inclusive education. We support 7 DSA profiles with adaptive interfaces, readable fonts, mind maps, and text-to-speech.
Mathematics, physics, chemistry, biology, history, literature, philosophy, art, music, and more. Each subject has dedicated AI professors.
Yes. We offer school plans with SSO integration, admin dashboards, usage analytics, and bulk student provisioning. Contact us for a pilot program.
All data is hosted in the EU (Frankfurt). We use encryption at rest and in transit, and follow SOC 2 security practices. We never sell user data.
